mapper.select: SELECT order_id, member_id, order_type, order_price, pay_method, receive_complete, date_format(reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') as r_date, postcode, addr1, addr2 FROM `order` WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE `order` SET member_id=#{member_id}, order_price=#{order_price}, order_type=#{order_type}, pay_method=#{pay_method}, receive_complete=#{receive_complete}, postcode=#{postcode}, addr1=#{addr1}, addr2=#{addr2} WHERE order_id=#{order_id}
